strings.string: Enabled. Thesaurus has been imported and is enabled. Uploading a new file will erase the existing thesaurus.
Disabled. Thesaurus has not yet been imported. Please import a thesaurus XML file before using this asset.
To demonstrate the expected structure of the imported XML file, an example file is available.
XML file is not in sync with thesaurus. Thesaurus contents were changed since the last time the XML file was generated. Please re-generate the file.
